contents.Text: You can add album art to a entire folder by making a file in the folder called 'album_art.png', which will be used if no embedded image is found in a file.
Alternatively: You can add album art directory called 'album_art' and any images with the supported formats will be randomised and used as album art, again only if no embedded image is present.
If you want to override any embedded images, you can use 'override_album_art' (file or directory), which will take priority over all other album art.
Supported formats for both 'album_art' and 'override_album_art' are (png, jpg, jpeg, webp).
Recommended image format is 'png' as this is what the other formats are converted to internally.
